item.description:
The Strand Cinema in Clinton is showing Jaws at 7:00 on Monday, July 12. Let's meet in the lobby at about 6:30 PM. If you need to reach me, feel free to call my cell phone at 508-981-0455.

- David

The Strand Theatre is doing a movie classics theme in July and August with Jaws, West Side Story, Raiders of the Lost Ark, etc. Movies are on Monday nights and all shows start at 7 pm. The Strand provides food and beverages (pizza, burgers, etc.) at the theatre and Clinton has a few restaurants/pubs that people can meet at before or afterward depending.

Here is the Summer Schedule:
July 12 - Jaws
July 19 - To Kill a Mockingbird
July 26 - West Side Story
August 2 - Ghostbusters
August 9 - Titanic
August 16 - Raiders of the Lost Ark

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Movie Classics - Jaws
